This artifact includes content from SNOMED Clinical Terms速 (SNOMED CT速) Global Patient Set (GPS), DICOM速 and LOINC速:

Additional information about this license specific to SNOMED International’s release of the GPS: * SNOMED CT is © and ® SNOMED International. The right to maintain the GPS remains vested exclusively in SNOMED International. * The Licensee can redistribute the GPS. * The Licensee can create derivatives or implementation-related products and services based on the GPS. * The Licensee cannot claim that SNOMED International or any of its Members endorses the Licensee’s derivative because it uses content from the GPS. * Neither SNOMED International nor any of the contributors accept any liability for the Licensee’s use or redistribution of the GPS. * SNOMED CT® was originally created by the College of American Pathologists.
Without obtaining prior written permission from SNOMED International, you are expressly prohibited from using, distributing or reproducing the SNOMED International, SNOMED CT or SNOMED GPS logo, service mark or trademark. Please review all terms and conditions of use [here](http://www.snomed.org/terms-and-conditions).
The copyright for the DICOM Standard is held by the National Electrical Manufacturers Association (NEMA) on behalf of the DICOM Standards Committee. Terms & Conditions in https://www.nema.org/About/Pages/Terms-and-Conditions.aspx
LOINC codes are copyright Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and the Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes (LOINC) Committee. Terms & Conditions in https://loinc.org/license/
